The claim originated from a Facebook pos: 2019, which alleged that Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez said, "owning guns IS NOT a right, if it were a right, it would be in the Constitution."
Ocasio: Cortez has expressed her belief in the Second Amendment but draws the line at allowing the severely mentally ill and people with a history of domestic abuse to purchase guns. She advocates for universal and improved background checks as well as banning assault weapons.
